mapper.insert: insert into t_address_book ( id, user_id, images, name, phones, tels, email, company, job, website, address, tags, remark, create_time, modify_time ) values ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{images}, #{name}, #{phones}, #{tels}, #{email}, #{company}, #{job}, #{website}, #{address}, #{tags}, #{remark}, now(), now() )
